attributes.action: make British traditions part of the National Curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain has lost its identity.  St Georges day is now celebrated by drinking continental lager whilst watching european football!
By making old traditions such as morris dancing and maypole dancing part of the national curriculum, this will increase community spirit in our over subscribed multi culture.
This should also be extended to regional variations, such as caber tossing, leek tossing, welly tossing, apple bobbing, cheese rolling.  It should be law that every resident of this once great country attends at least 6 local events (church fetes, school fairs etc) per annum
